title: O manamE
sahitya:
O manamE matiyilAdu Odi alaiyAdE Om murugA Om ena OdiDAdu nI


anupallavi

  tAmasa guNam unnai taLLa nI taDumAri kAma pAshak-kaDalil kavizhnduzhalum pOdu


caraNam    AyAsamurAdu nI apAyamurum pOdu OyAdu Om murugA Om Om Om enrAl
OyAda alai kaDalil UshalADum Or paDagu shAyAdu tattikkarai sErvadottu uyvAi
